plugin.name: qprac
plugin.author: Renoir
plugin.purpose: Provide the best attack/spell for the current class/tier/level

muclient.aliases: <alias match="^qprac list (( (?P[12]?\d{1,2}) (?P[12]?\d{1,2}|\*))?( (?P\w+))?( (?P1?\d{1,2}) (?P1?\d{1,2}))?)?$" enabled="y" regexp="y" sequence="100" ignore_case="y" script="qprac_list" >
muclient.script:
function qprac_help() Note("This is help documentation") end
function qprac_list(alias, line, wildcards) Note("Min Level: "..wildcards.minlevel) Note("Max Level: "..wildcards.maxlevel) Note("Category: "..wildcards.category) Note("Min Prac:"..wildcards.minprac) Note("Max Prac:"..wildcards.maxprac) end
